reviews.review: Gen rush the fuck out of everyone
Muy buen juego solo que hay que saber escapar del asesiso xd
no buff killer and survival op 1 knockdown 2 generator and find queue not matching rank 20 found rank 1-4 every game "pretty good job so far"
This game is pretty fun but like in the worst possible way. I don't know.

The game is  just so survivor sided that any killer who isnt running a specific, MAX level type build will be generally unsuccessful. Doesn't feel balanced whatosever, and killer gameplay is extremely unsatisfactory. Not to mention, there are known exploits in the game that have been out for months. I only know this because one of my firends was using one of these, and recently got perma-banned for it. Fair enough, yes, but what's ridiculous is that the devs would rather just punish players for their own mistakes than fix the known issues and be accountable. If you have friends and are looking for an extremely easy game to just mess around in and get wins handed to you like you are in a bread line, this is the spot for you. However, if you are looking for a fun game to try and master and play as killers, PLEASE SAVE YOUR TIME AND MONEY. It will take you way too long to get to a successful point, and the journey along may cost you some of your gaming equipment. Player base is toxic, game is unbalanced and unrewarding, and the devs are more concerned with getting a dollar than the games' health. 

You may have more fun dropping a 200 lb boat anchor on your big toe repeatedly.

Literal mental CBT, some pain some joy

Don't get this game if you love running into hackers that constantly bully you as a killer. 
Instant pickups, 100% getting off hooks, instant genny pops, and stuns that last the whole game. The devs don't want to do anything about this problem, let alone address this problem. This is the third time I have ran into hackers in the few weeks I've played recently. I've played this game on console since the first DLC with easily 1000+ hours and never ran into them until I switched to PC here recently. The only way to combat the hackers is to leave the match. However, once you leave you get a temp ban that increases in time with every leave. So the devs punish you for leaving, wont do anything if you report them and wont strengthen the integrity of the game.

I love this game and didn't let the toxic community ruin it for me, but now I cant stand by it anymore after the devs have failed this game and only care about coming out with new killers and survivors just to make money. I wish I can get this game refunded so in the mean time I will uninstall.
Love this game. Makes me want to die.
They change alot about this game every year, but no new maps or game modes. Want you to spend $$$ on a dlc then a legendary skin that costs the same as a dlc.

fun to play with friends. easy to rage at. i exclusively play survivor because i am a pacifist. the survivor vs killer balance is not very balanced, killers have pretty much every advantage. but if you troll well enough you have a shot of escaping !

I wish I could recommend this game, as it has so much potential.
However, it is a mess of cheaters and trolls.
I've played quite a bit now, and I can say with all confidence that the cheating and trolling is becoming an issue in EVERY game. It is now impossible to play a game as it is intended.
If you look it up on youtube, you will see exactly what I mean.
And the saddest part of all is that the studio is well aware of these problems, but is seemingly indifferent. Like many other studios, Behaviour now seems to consider only sales and micro transactions. A situation which shall only accelerate given the studio's positive view of NFTs.
You cannot say that you haven't now been warned. Instead, wait for VHS to be released, or try Hunt: Showdown.

Bought this years ago, couldn't get into it. Picked it up a few times to see if I could get into the game and really couldn't, state of the game currently seems much more healthy  and with the help of friends Ive begun to enjoy it. I always enjoyed the killer aspect but felt different until I tried it again this time. Game seems to be in a good place a few killers are hard to play against two I personally won't play due to how unfun they are to play against. But you don't run into them half as much as the other killers. So seems to make the game much more tolerable.

Good game, but slight improvements can be made with hit-boxes and hit detection. Other than that it's a good game that doesn't really take much skill at the start. but you will eventually get better the more you progress.
Super fun game to play with friends or solo (killer recommended). Every update is exciting; brings new content and mechanics to the game. Highly recommended.
trash game don't waste ur time

I recommend this game for people that play it once in a while, because it can be a thrilling experience at first and fun to learn different abilities/perks and get chased around or being the one chasing. 

However, for the long-run, this game is not as great. Main reason being that after a while, you notice that the variety in the gameplay highly depends on perks and killer abilities. No new creative game modes are added, and every killer that comes out now is a paid DLC. After a while the game just gets stale and you end up playing killer only, which is miserable to play as the more you rank up due to survivor sweats with 4k hours who are the only ones still playing the game. Same thing vise versa when playing survivor. This leads to both sides constantly complaining about who is overpowered and who is not, because that is the only thing you can talk about in this game.

Game is pretty good and when you get good matches in your skill rank its fun, but the ranking system is garbage, I as a new killer (and survivor) i get matched up against the highest ranks and just get instantly outplayed and played around with.
Would have been a recommend if i got matched against my own rank, but the ranking system ruins the game for me.
